item.title: How to learn & infer a transformer English-Japanese translation model with Cloud TPU
item.description: [Official Tutorial](https://cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/tutorials/transformer?hl=ja) If you proceeded according to the street, it didn't work, so take a note. In this article, we will explain how to launch CloudTPU and GCE VM instances and build an English-Japanese translation model using transformer, which is one of the NMT models. Premise You have already created a project on Google Cloud Platform Billing is enabled for created projects Cloud Console In Cloud Console, enter the following to launch a new CloudTPU and GCE VM instance.
